price: Basi ikawadhihirikia baada ya kuona Ishara kuwa wamfunge kwa muda.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: Kisha ikadhihiri rai ya Mheshimiwa na watu wake, baada ya kwisha ona dalili zilizo wazi kuwa Yusuf hana makosa. Wakakubaliana rai hii, na wakaapa kuitimiza. Nayo ni kumtia yeye gerezani kwa muda mfupi au mrefu, ili kumkinga mkewe na maneno mabaya, na kumuepusha na masengenyo ya watu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
